EmailTemplate.name: Send Proposal Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Proposal for Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Enclosed with this email, you will find a comprehensive proposal document outlining the details of our Products. This carefully curated bundle offers a range of products tailored to meet your specific requirements. Additionally, a detailed price list accompanies the proposal for your reference.
We kindly request your esteemed review of the attached proposal document. Your feedback and insights are of great value to us, and we are eager to ensure that our offering aligns seamlessly with your expectations.
Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.
We deeply appreciate the opportunity to collaborate with you and eagerly await your response.
Warm regards, Airtel
